abstract: Spotify retains Goldman Sachs to raise $500 million in private investment, which could delay initial public offering; valuation would increase to at least $6 billion.
lead_paragraph: The move would increase the firm’s valuation to at least $6 billion, according to a person briefed on the company’s plans.
snippet: The move would increase the firm’s valuation to at least $6 billion, according to a person briefed on the company’s plans.

headline.main: Spotify to Raise $500 Million; Move Could Delay an I.P.O.
headline.print_headline: Spotify to Raise $500 Million; Move Could Delay an I.P.O.
